library(tidyverse)

head(dist)

view(flights)

 view(airports)
flight_distance <- flights%>%
arrange(distance)
?slice
flight_distance_max <- flight_distance%>%
  slice_max(distance)
flight_distance_max%>%
  left_join(airports, c("dest" = "faa"))
